<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Sodden Sentinel](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2115)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 32</row>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +26

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** -1

**Con** +7

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A sodden sentinel is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 320
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
positive 15, slashing 15

**Tainted Guts** When a sodden sentinel is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it explodes, dealing 6d6 bludgeoning damage to each creature in a 10-foot emanation (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that fails this save is also [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1d4 rounds (1 minute on a critical failure).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +24,
**Damage** 2d12+16 bludgeoning plus [Improved Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=28)

**Pummel the Fallen**   A sodden sentinel's fist Strike deals an additional 2d6 damage to [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) creatures.

**Seawater Retch** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) The sodden sentinel vomits up a supernaturally tainted wave of seawater in a 30-foot cone. Each living creature in the area takes 6d10 negative damage (DC 30 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). It can't use Seawater Retch again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
name: Sodden Sentinel
